title: Eli Lilly plans $3.5 billion manufacturing plant in Pennsylvania to make next-generation obesity injections
summary_full: The plant will help make Lilly's experimental drug called retatrutide, which has shown the highest weight loss seen to date in a late-stage trial.
summary_public: The plant will help make Lilly's experimental drug called retatrutide, which has shown the highest weight loss seen to date in a late-stage trial.
